text: Cecil searched in his pockets once more and came up with two paper-clips. After a few seconds of twisting, he roughly thrust a bent wire loop into the lock and waggled it around vigorously. There was a click and the briefcase opened. Cecil thrust an eager hand inside, his fingers groping after wads of five pound notes.

Cecil thrust an eager hand inside, his fingers groping after wads of five pound notes.
